name: Projekt Ominous Forest.
description:
Ominous forest is a horror project for the PC. The game begins with the fact that the main character, that is, you, got lost in the forest and now he needs to find a way to get out of the forest. As you progress, you will realize that strange things are happening here, and you may be in danger. The project is currently under active development, which means that new parts will be added and updates will be released. The game's plot is currently less than half complete, so it's not that much. But in any case, you can play this game, look at what has already been done. Have a good game!

You can learn more about the project development in the Vkontakte group https://vk.com/ominousforest
